scripts.migrate: npx prisma migrate dev --name init --schema=./database/prisma/chat.prisma && npx prisma migrate dev --name init --schema=./database/prisma/user.prisma
scripts.generate: npx prisma generate --schema=./database/prisma/chat.prisma && npx prisma generate --schema=./database/prisma/user.prisma
scripts.push: npx prisma db push --schema=./database/prisma/user.prisma --force-reset && npx prisma db push --schema=./database/prisma/chat.prisma --force-reset
